name: Keplerth
detailed_description:
"You wake up and found yourself lying in a hibernation pod, with no food, no clothes, no nothing. All you have to do is survive. Finding ways to use things around you will help you in surviving and uncovering the mysteries of this strange and dangerous planet."

Keplerth is a survival sandbox game that contains resource gathering, fighting, crafting, building and farming systems.It also allows players to explore both on the ground and underground.

Key features:

- Randomly generated endless world map
- Crafting
- Building
- Farming
- Animal breeding
- Underground dungeon
- Lots of weapons, clothes and constructions
- Lots of creatures, animals, monsters and bosses
